response.name: Secret Text
response.description: Select this option if you want a string (like a password) to be encrypted
response.yaml:
secret:
  type: SecretText
  name: name
  description: ""
  identifier: identifier
  spec:
    secretManagerIdentifier: harnessSecretManager
    valueType: Inline

response.name: Secret File
response.description: Select this option if you want a file (like a certificate) to be encrypted
response.yaml:
secret:
  type: SecretFile
  name: name
  description: ""
  identifier: identifier
  spec:
    secretManagerIdentifier: harnessSecretManager

response.name: SSH Key
response.yaml:
secret:
  type: SSHKey
  name: ""
  description: ""
  identifier: ""
  tags: {}
  spec:
    port: 22
    auth:
      type: SSH
      spec:
        credentialType: KeyReference
        spec:
          userName: ""
          key: ""
          encryptedPassphrase: ""
